verses.roman:
sarva vaiṣṇava dekhi' sukha baḍa pāilā
yathā-yogya sabā-sane ānande mililā

synonyms: sarva vaiṣṇava—all the Vaiṣṇavas; dekhi'—seeing; sukha—happiness; baḍa—very much; pāilā—got; yathā-yogya—as is befitting; sabā-sane—along with everyone; ānande—in happiness; mililā—met.
translation: Upon seeing all the Vaiṣṇavas together, Kāśī Miśra and the superintendent became very happy. With great happiness they met with the devotees in a befitting manner.
